DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate performance benefit supplement Army standard Physical Readiness Training ( PRT ) define kettlebell ( KB ) deadlift swing train program compare standalone PRT . Power performance measure horizontal ( broad ) vertical jump , 40 yard sprint , 60 yard shuttle , Army Physical Fitness Test ( APFT ) . It hypothesize unique force distribution kettlebell train promote improved power , particularly across horizontal plane , compare standalone Army PRT . Findings potentially provide insight Army unit effectively utilize kettlebells diversify train program .
DOC.brief_title: Kettlebell Training Measured Across Power Performance
DOC.detailed_description: A sample 140 subject recruit remedial physical training population Corps Cadets . This achieve regular communication company level Tactical Officers ( TAC ) Physical Development Officers ( PDO ) . Upon consent , unit integrity maintain team Cadets randomize either Army standard PRT group KB group . Once group assign , PDO 's provided training calendar upcoming eight week period kettlebell safety/familiarization session arrange unit KB group . Prior start training , subject undergo pre-assessment follow performance measure : broad jump , vertical jump , 40 yard sprint 60 yard shuttle . Current APFT score collect West Point Academy Management System ( AMS ) . After assessment , assign PRT group conduct training accordance Army Field Manual 7-22 ( sustainment phase activity ) . The KB group conduct training exception kettlebell exercise place strength train circuit ( occurs alternate day ) . KB exercise initially instruct principal investigator ( certify kettlebell instructor CrossfitÂ® ) , independence exercise note , principal investigator 's role become supervisory continued KB exercise execute leadership unit PDO 's . Upon conclusion eight week training program , subject undergo post-assessment consist measure note previously . Follow APFT score collect either West Point AMS grade test TACs/PDOs diagnostic test . Once data collection complete , analysis perform use SPSS version 19 . A 2x2 mixed-model analysis variance perform application Sidak 's multiple comparison test determine statistical significance reach .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Male Female Cadets Age 1827 Emancipated minor age 17 Remedial physical training participant Exclusion Selfreported pregnancy Participants fluent English History musculoskeletal injury last month Any history spondylolisthesis History orthopedic surgery last six month Condition result surgery study , Missing > 1 exercise session per week
